HomePage.title: Welcome to my profile
HomePage.introduction: I am currently a third-year student at <link>Centrale Lyon</link>. I am particularly enthusiast about web development and also interested in many topics around computer science: cybersecurity, data analysis, data visualization...
HomePage.desc-projects: Here are some projects carried out during my studies and in my free time.
HomePage.no-study-found-desc: No study has taught me this language. Please check <link>projects</link> to see those related to this language.

centrale.title: General Engineering Program
centrale.description: Comprehensive engineering education covering various fields such as computer science, mathematics, physics, and project management.

Visualisation.name: Data Visualization
Visualisation.description: Study of data visualization techniques, tools and best practices to effectively communicate information through graphical and interactive representations.

Database.name: Relational Databases
Database.description: Introduction to relational database concepts, SQL language, database design and optimization techniques.

DataScience.name: Data Science
DataScience.description: Introduction to data science concepts : data analysis, machine learning, and statistical modeling using Python.

WebApps.name: Web Development
WebApps.description: Learning the fundamental concepts of web development, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and client-server relationships.

CppGui.name: C++ & Qt for GUI Development
CppGui.description: Introduction to C++ programming and the Qt framework for developing graphical user interfaces.

IA-introduction.name: Introduction to Artificial Intelligence
IA-introduction.description: Overview of artificial intelligence concepts, including machine learning, neural networks, and natural language processing.

reseaux.name: Computer Networks
reseaux.description: Study of the principles of the 7 layers of the OSI standard, network protocols, and machine-to-machine communication.

cybersecu.name: Cybersecurity
cybersecu.description: Introduction to cybersecurity principles, including threat analysis, risk management, and security protocols with a general overview of the different types of attacks and defenses tools.

BigData.name: Big Data
BigData.description: Study of Big Data technologies and tools for processing large volumes of data.

univ.title: Master's Degree in Information and Web Technologies
univ.description: Data science-focused program covering data visualization, Big Data, and data analysis techniques.

DataAnalysis.name: Data Analysis
DataAnalysis.description: Processing complex datasets to analyze and visualize while minimizing biases and data loss. Creation of an interactive user interface to visualize and analyze a large dataset.

BigData.name: Big Data
BigData.description: Study of Big Data technologies, from distributed data storage to processing frameworks like Hadoop and Spark with some works on stream processing of live data streams.

fermat.title: Preparatory class for high schools
fermat.description: Intensive two-year program preparing students for entrance exams to French engineering schools, focusing on mathematics, physics, and computer science.

info.name: Computer Science
info.description: Introduction to programming concepts as algorithms and problem-solving techniques.

math.name: Mathematics
math.description: Advanced study of mathematical concepts including calculus, algebra, and geometry.

phy.name: Physics
phy.description: In-depth study of physics concepts : mechanics, electricity, optics, quantum mechanics, chemistry...

stage-application.name: Web Application for Sports Data Collection
stage-application.description: Web application development for collecting sports data with image and video processing for research purposes

jeu-inclusif.name: Inclusif : le jeu
jeu-inclusif.description: Development of a serious game into a web application to raise awareness about digital inclusion among web project during the creation, development and management process.

paragraph.text: This project was made in a group of seven people during a study project of a year. We learned to use Agile methodologies to manage the project and we used Figma to visualize the UI and Angular with HTML and CSS to actually make it. The project includes three main parts:
li: the serious game itself where the player has to make choices to create an inclusive web project ;
a questionnaire to evaluates the player's knowledge about digital inclusion ;
a self-assessment form to help the player evaluate their own web projects regarding digital inclusion.

challenger.name: Challenger
challenger.description: Design and development of a part of a web application to manage a student association's activities for the preparation and organization of the annual event.

miss-hestia.name: Showcase Website - Miss Hestia
miss-hestia.description: Development of a showcase website to highlight an artist's artworks.

conference.name: Conference Database Management
conference.description: Development of a web application to manage a false conference database. The purpose of the project is to optimize the database design, then to optimize SQL queries to finally create a simple user-friendly interface.

data-dash.name: Covid Data Visualization
data-dash.description: Interactive user interface to visualize and analyze a large dataset.

moteur-recherche.name: Search Engine
moteur-recherche.description: Development of a simple search engine using natural language processing techniques. Furthermore, there is the implementation of a graph-based solution by taking into account the citations between documents.

jeu-dame.name: Web Draughts Game
jeu-dame.description: Implementation of a web-based draughts game to learn the basics of web development, JavaScript, and the concept of sockets.

2048-qt.description: Realization of a 2048 in C++ using Qt GUI. Many additional features were added including an attempt to create a suika.

useful-components.name: Useful Components
useful-components.description: Simple and reusable React component libraries to learn both the React framework and the creation of basic components.

profile.name: Portfolio Personnel
profile.description: Realization of a portfolio website to share my profile and many of my projects done. This is the website you are currently on.

ProjectPage.title: My Projects
ProjectPage.introduction: You will find below the list of my completed or ongoing projects. Some projects are carried out as part of my studies, others have been done purely by passion. Moreover, the projects are divided between short and complete ones.
